title: 267- The Trials of Dan and Dave
description: This is the story of an ad campaign produced for the 1992 Olympic games in Barcelona. Perennial runner-up in the sports shoe category, Reebok, was trying to make its mark and take down Nike. They chose two athletes, plucked them … Continue reading →
author: roman@99pi.org (Roman Mars)
